pkgmetadata.longdescription: # wps-light*wemake-python-styleguide*, but lighter.```bashpip install wps-light```This project is simply a fork of[wemake-python-styleguide](https://github.com/wemake-services/wemake-python-styleguide),**without these flake8 plugins dependencies**:- flake8-commas- flake8-quotes- flake8-comprehensions- flake8-docstrings- flake8-string-format- flake8-bugbear - flake8-debugger- flake8-isort- flake8-eradicate- flake8-bandit- flake8-broken-line- flake8-rst-docstrings- pep8-naming- darglintPlease refer to [wemake-python-styleguide's documentation](https://wemake-python-stylegui.de/en/latest/).
